description: Try our easy to follow Tuna Pasta Salad + Snacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Tuna Pasta Salad + Snacks Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Lunch: For tuna pasta salad, combine pasta with tuna, reserved oil, tomato and snow peas. Serve with grapes and cheese cubes. Snack 1: Pack cucumber and hummus separately in lunch box. Snack 2: To make date & coconut bliss balls, place oats, coconut and cocoa in a food processor and process until finely chopped. With motor running, gradually add dates until finely chopped and well combined. Add banana and process until mixture comes together in a ball. Place extra coconut on a large plate. Roll 1 tbs of mixture into a ball then roll in coconut to coat. Repeat with remaining mixture to make 12 balls. Place in airtight container in fridge to chill. Thread 2 balls onto a lollypop stick and place in lunch box. note: date & coconut bliss balls recipe serves 6
